portraits_professionnels.description: Prompts pour créer des portraits professionnels de haute qualité

prompts.name: Portrait Corporate
prompts.prompt: Professional headshot portrait of a [gender] [age] business executive, wearing a [color] suit, neutral gray background, soft studio lighting, sharp focus on eyes, 8K resolution, photorealistic

prompts.name: Portrait LinkedIn
prompts.prompt: LinkedIn profile photo, friendly [gender] professional smiling confidently, business casual attire, blurred office background with natural lighting, warm tones, professional photography style

prompts.name: Portrait Créatif
prompts.prompt: Creative professional portrait of a [profession], artistic lighting with dramatic shadows, [color scheme] color palette, modern studio setting, fashion photography style, high detail

produits_ecommerce.description: Prompts pour images de produits e-commerce

prompts.name: Produit sur Fond Blanc
prompts.prompt: Product photography of [product], pure white background, professional studio lighting, multiple angles view, high resolution, commercial quality, clean and minimalist

prompts.name: Produit Lifestyle
prompts.prompt: [Product] in a lifestyle setting, [environment] background, natural lighting, aspirational mood, Instagram-worthy composition, soft shadows, warm color grading

prompts.name: Produit 360
prompts.prompt: 360-degree product view of [product], floating in space, soft gradient background from [color1] to [color2], professional product photography, reflective surface, studio lighting

illustrations_marketing.description: Prompts pour illustrations marketing et publicitaires

prompts.name: Bannière Publicitaire
prompts.prompt: Modern advertising banner design for [product/service], bold typography space, [color] gradient background, dynamic composition, eye-catching visuals, marketing material style

prompts.name: Infographie
prompts.prompt: Clean infographic illustration about [topic], flat design style, [color palette] colors, icons and data visualization elements, professional business graphics, vector art style

prompts.name: Social Media Post
prompts.prompt: Engaging social media post image for [platform], [theme] theme, vibrant colors, modern design, attention-grabbing composition, square format, trendy aesthetic

prompts.name: Art Conceptuel
prompts.prompt: Concept art of [subject], [art style] style, dramatic lighting, rich details, cinematic composition, digital painting, trending on ArtStation, 4K resolution

prompts.name: Illustration Fantasy
prompts.prompt: Fantasy illustration of [scene], magical atmosphere, ethereal lighting, [color mood] color palette, highly detailed, epic composition, digital art masterpiece

prompts.name: Art Abstrait
prompts.prompt: Abstract art composition, [emotion] mood, fluid shapes, [colors] color harmony, contemporary art style, museum quality, high resolution print ready

immobilier_architecture.description: Prompts pour visualisation immobilière et architecturale

prompts.name: Rendu Intérieur
prompts.prompt: Photorealistic interior design render of a [room type], [style] style, natural daylight through large windows, high-end furniture, warm ambiance, architectural visualization

prompts.name: Extérieur Architectural
prompts.prompt: Architectural exterior visualization of a [building type], modern [style] design, landscaped surroundings, golden hour lighting, professional architectural photography

prompts.name: Vue Aérienne
prompts.prompt: Aerial view of [property/development], drone photography style, [time of day] lighting, surrounding neighborhood visible, real estate marketing quality

general: Inclure le style d'éclairage pour plus de contrôle
Utiliser des termes comme 'photorealistic' pour des images réalistes
Mentionner 'trending on ArtStation' pour un style artistique moderne
commercial_use: Adobe Firefly est le plus sûr pour usage commercial
Vérifier les licences avant utilisation commerciale
Éviter les marques déposées dans les prompts
